subject: RTSC Show Tonight at 6pm est.--Paranormal TV Network
author: Urkel23
full_text:
Join us as we welcome special guest tonight Phoenix Amadeus.

Here is a little about him:

http://www.paraspectralinnovations.com/

Phoenix Amadeus is a Canadian writer, a psychic and a specialist in paranormal
breakthroughs. His work started in 2001 involving many discoveries and bridging
the gap between the science and the spirit world. His test subjects are mainly
skeptics and all results are 100% positive. Phoenix discovered that material
form does exist in the spirit world. There are ways to make this materialize,
and ways to contact loved ones who are of spirit.

He has written an e-book called "The Dark Cloud Invasion"

The eBook in PDF format - 'The Dark Cloud Invasion' is based on paranormal
discoveries made by the Author & Psychic - Phoenix Amadeus. This eBook is based
on facts not theories and it shows you, step-by-step how to open your psychic
gifts. The eBook also helps to build a complete awareness of the spirit world.
it is designed for all including skeptics to learn from. A well hidden secret,
'Dark Clouds' is now exposed. And it shows how Dark Clouds have affected our
lives for many generations.

Please come join us tonight, which should be another great show. Here's how to
do it:

http://www.paranormaltvnetwork.com/channel2.html

We will also be taking call-ins during the show, the number to call is #
732-587-7041

See You there,
-Steve H.
